INSERT INTO PAYROLL_PAYSLIP ( EMP_NO, PAYROLL_NO, BASIC_SALARY, OVERTIME_ALLOWANCE, HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE, ANNUAL_LEAVE_ALLOWANCE, MEAL_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES, BONUS, SPECIAL_ALLOWANCE, EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, HEALTH_INSURANCE, NATIONAL_PENSION, TAX, LOCAL_INCOME_TAX, PAYROLL_BANK, PAYROLL_ACCOUNT, PAYROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( #{empNo} , PAYROLL_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{basicSalary} , #{overtimeAllowance} , #{holidayAllowance} , #{annualLeaveAllowance} , #{mealExpenses} , #{transportationExpenses} , #{bonus} , #{specialAllowance}
, TRUNC((#{basicSalary} + #{overtimeAllowance} + #{holidayAllowance} + #{annualLeaveAllowance} + #{mealExpenses} + #{transportationExpenses} + #{bonus} + #{specialAllowance}) * 0.008, -1)
, TRUNC((#{basicSalary} + #{overtimeAllowance} + #{holidayAllowance} + #{annualLeaveAllowance} + #{mealExpenses} + #{transportationExpenses} + #{bonus} + #{specialAllowance}) * 0.03495, -1)
, TRUNC((#{basicSalary} + #{overtimeAllowance} + #{holidayAllowance} + #{annualLeaveAllowance} + #{mealExpenses} + #{transportationExpenses} + #{bonus} + #{specialAllowance}) * 0.045, -1)
, TRUNC((#{basicSalary} + #{overtimeAllowance} + #{holidayAllowance} + #{annualLeaveAllowance} + #{mealExpenses} + #{transportationExpenses} + #{bonus} + #{specialAllowance}) * 0.01, -1)
, TRUNC(((#{basicSalary} + #{overtimeAllowance} + #{holidayAllowance} + #{annualLeaveAllowance} + #{mealExpenses} + #{transportationExpenses} + #{bonus} + #{specialAllowance}) * 0.01) * 0.1, -1)
, #{payrollBank} , #{payrollAccount} , SYSDATE )
